title: Drew Barrymore and Jennifer Aniston on Adam Sandler | Mark Twain Prize
description:
Watch the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor celebrating Adam Sandler on CNN.com or CNNgo.

https://www.kennedy-center.org/whats-on/marktwain/

The Kennedy Center's Mark Twain Prize, which is named to honor one of the worldâ€™s greatest humorists, was awarded to Adam Sandler at a gala performance featuring some of the biggest names in comedy -- including Chris Rock, Conan O'Brien, Ben Stiller, Dana Carvey, Pete Davidson, Drew Barrymore, Jennifer Anniston, Idina Menzel, David Spade, and more -- on March 19, 2023, and aired nationally on CNN on March 26, 2023.

The Mark Twain Prize for American Humor recognizes individuals who have had an impact on American society in ways similar to the distinguished 19th-century novelist and essayist Samuel Clemens, best known as Mark Twain. As a social commentator, satirist, and creator of characters, Clemens was a fearless observer of society, who startled many while delighting and informing many more with his uncompromising perspective on social injustice and personal folly.

â€œAdam Sandler has entertained audiences for over three decades with his films, music, and his tenure as a fan favorite cast member on SNL,â€ said Kennedy Center President Deborah F. Rutter about this yearâ€™s recipient. â€œAdam has created characters that have made us laugh, cry, and cry from laughing. I am looking forward to a laughter-filled evening like no other as we celebrate his career at a ceremony that is sure to bring together the best in comedy.â€

#MarkTwainPrize #AdamSandler #drewbarrymore #jenniferaniston #kennedycenter #cnn

title: Pamela Anderson Shares Why She Has DITCHED Makeup; Inspires Drew Barrymore & Valerie Bertinelli, Too
description:
Pamela Anderson is inspiring women, including Drew Barrymore and Valerie Bertinelli, to embrace their natural, makeup-free faces. In an episode of â€œThe Drew Barrymore Show,â€ which aired Tuesday, Oct. 22, Pamela, Drew, and Valerie all showed off their bare faces, with the actress sharing why she ditched makeup for good. â€œIsn't it freeing? Doesn't it feel free? I feel free. I mean, it's taken a while too; I've had my little, you know, journey with it, but we all are our own worst critics,â€ she said in part, before explaining that she began attending events makeup-free in September 2023 when she stepped out for Fashion Week. â€œI was at Paris Fashion Week and decided [if] I was just going to a fashion show, I didn't need to compete with anybody. Like, why am I wasting three hours in a makeup chair when I have these beautiful Vivienne Westwood clothes on,â€ she said, adding, â€œAnd I didn't realize anyone would even notice. So then, when people started coming up to me and talking about it, I thought, 'Well, this is a great message.'â€

title: Drew Barrymore Visits President Joe Biden & First Lady Dr. Jill Biden for Christmas | Drew Barrymore
description:

POTUS and FLOTUS discuss their long-lasting relationship and reveal the one Christmas gift the President gives the First Lady every year. title: Drew Barrymore Reacts to Surprise Gift from Spice Girl Mel B | The Drew Barrymore Show
description:
Former Spice Girl Mel B is joining Drew Barrymore to tell her all about her new memoir, â€œBrutally Honest.â€ 

Below is an excerpt from Mel B's book "Brutally Honest" on signs you may be in a domestic violence relationship : 
1. Tells you that you can never do anything right
2. Shows extreme jealousy of your friends and time spent away 
3. Keeps you or discourages you from seeing family or friends
4. Insults, demeans, or shames you with put-downs 
5. controls every penny spent in the household
6. Looks at you or acts in a way that scares you 
7. Prevents you from making your own decisions 
8. Prevents you from working or attending school
9. Destroys your property or threatens to hurt or kill your pets
10. Pressures you to have sex when you don't want to or do things sexual that you aren't comfortable with
11. Pressures you to use substances

For more resources, take a look at the links below:
https://www.womensaid.org.uk/
https://www.thehotline.org/
https://ncadv.org/resources

Check out Mel B's book â€œBrutally Honestâ€ here: https://amzn.to/3TSQkte

title: Drew Barrymore  Reveals Sheâ€™s Been Told To â€˜Back Offâ€™ For Being â€˜Touchyâ€™
description:
Drew Barrymore and Cynthia Erivo are on the same page when it comes to physical touch. During the Dec. 10 episode of â€œThe Drew Barrymore Show,â€ the talk show host revealed that sheâ€™s been warned to â€œback off a little bitâ€ due to being â€œso touchy.â€ Drewâ€™s comments came after she asked the â€œWickedâ€ actress if her co-star, Ariana Grande, is also as â€œtouchy,â€ leading Cynthia to confirm that she is and explain how they both use physical touch to communicate. â€œThat's sometimes how she and I communicate, we might be talking to someone or I might need to, like, communicate something to her. And it's just a squeeze of the hand or just like a pinch of a finger or a hug,â€ the British performer shared. She and Drew also agreed that physical connection does not always have to correlate with being romantic.

title: Cooper Koch interview on the Drew Barrymore Show
Drew Barrymore Gets 1st HOT FLASH w/ Jennifer Aniston & Adam Sandler
description: Drew Barrymore is keeping it real! The 48-year-old interrupted her own interview with Jennifer Aniston and Adam Sandler to reveal she may have been experiencing her first-ever hot flash. "I'm so hot, I think I'm having one of my first perimenopause hot flashes," she said while holding hands with Jen. During the candid moment on "The Drew Barrymore Show" earlier this week, her famous friends comforted her as she recovered. "It's supposed to come with a very heavy anger mood swing maybe you can bring that out soon too," Adam joked as Drew shared an on-point scowl.

title: Drew Barrymore Reveals the Surprising Sleeping Position She Discovered During Pregnancy & Still Uses
description:
Drew Barrymore, 49, has shared a surprising detail about her sleep routine that she discovered during pregnancy and still uses today. The actress and talk show host revealed that she sleeps with a body pillow, just as she did when she was expecting her two daughters. "I sleep with a body pillow like Iâ€™m still pregnant!" Barrymore toldÂ PEOPLE.

As a mom, businesswoman, and someone with a constantly busy mind, Barrymore found it difficult to get quality rest, often tossing and turning or staying up late. However, she has recently found that creating a cooler sleep environment has been a "game-changer" for her. She partnered with Rest in November as the bedding brandâ€™s official â€œSleep Wellness Advocateâ€ and credits their Evercool Cooling Comforter for improving her sleep. Barrymore noted that she has never slept better and even had to get separate comforters for her daughters, Olive and Frankie, as they started stealing hers.

TheÂ Drew Barrymore ShowÂ host also emphasized the importance of prioritizing sleep, likening it to nutrition and exercise in terms of necessity. "We canâ€™t be our best selves without a good nightâ€™s rest," she said, explaining that quality sleep is crucial for mental and physical well-being. Barrymoreâ€™s bedtime routine includes reading or saying goodnight to her cats and dog before falling asleep quickly.

For Drew, quality sleep is essential to her health and how she shows up in the world.
